body: Don't be scared of me on TS xD I joined the other day and I kept trying to find people to talk with and everyone would just..kinda leave when I joined... -.- Oh well.
body_tagged: Don't be scared of me on TS xD I joined the other day and I kept trying to find people to talk with and everyone would just..kinda leave when I joined... -.- Oh well.
title: TeamSpeak :P

replies.body:
You don't necessarily have to talk to one person at a time. You can try to join a conversation (politely) or start one with other people in your game :P


And guys, don't just leave when someone else joins, it's not cool.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Don't worry, people were probably just bored or something.

Don't be shy on TeamSpeak, it's great that you are at least being active. :)

replies.body: i wouldn't recommend joining a chat with only one other person unless you know them well. its kind of awkward and they dont want to be forced into the situation.
